title: Virus
occurrences: Positive. The virus is still quite active.

I want you to get this virus to Doctor Leisenhau, nothing more!
It's vitally important to find out who stole that virus!
At extremely low temperatures the virus is completely dormant.
The virus, if it is a virus, is like the common cold.
Meyer said that the virus remains dormant in cold temperatures.
We do know something about this virus.
We know this virus remains dormant under sub-zero conditions.
..pooling our scientific knowledge so we can survive until the virus dies out.
No, he just went back to his laboratory to work on the vaccine against the virus.
..it appears that high levels of radiation, introduced into a living virus cell...
The virus would kill us anyway.
We've all had injections of my vaccine against the virus.
..virus is probably no longer a threat.
